ValidationRule.description: Minutes late field is mandatory if outcome is arrived late (seen or not)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (OR(ISPICKVAL( Outcome__c , 'Arrived late and Seen'), ISPICKVAL( Outcome__c , 'Arrived late and not seen')), ISPICKVAL( Minutes_Late__c,""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Minutes late field is mandatory if outcome is arrived late (seen or not)
